alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hidalgo, northeastern Starr and southeastern Brooks Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of El Coyote Ranch Airport, or 12 miles west of Rachal, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rachal, Encino and El Coyote Ranch Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Deep South Texas.
